title: Personal hygiene for women. Part 2
brief_description: Describes the hygienic measures necessary to prevent the spread of contagious diseases. Shows in an experiment how a cold may be spread. Points out the prevalence of venereal disease, and explains the cause, symptoms, cure, and prevention of syphilis, gonorrhoea, and chancroid.
